page.title: 07Events _ School Sports.
page.content: All through the year at school we play sports.Just after we come back to school after the summer holiday we play the Charmouth football tournament which this year we came 3rd out of about fourteen schools. Then the next football we play is the six a side floodlit football league which this year we won the silver plate.The next sport we play is the football and netball league which the girls drew with Charmouth so we will have the shield for the next half term.About half way through the football and netball league the football team play the Colfox tournament After the football and netball leagues are finished the girls play their Woodroffe tournament which we won this year.Then we begin to practise the
